com.plexus.sam.config
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  com.plexus.sam.config.Configuration

public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

The configuration class can load() or save() itself to an XML file. The location of this file is determined by calling StaticConfig.get("config-path").

The configuration is divided into groups, ConfigGroup, i.e. net, audio, ... each containing a number of key/value pairs.

Author:
plexus
